org.fcrepo.kernel.modeshape.utils

Class PropertyChangedListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.rdf.listeners.StatementListener
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.modeshape.utils.PropertyChangedListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.jena.rdf.model.ModelChangedListener

    public class PropertyChangedListener
extends org.apache.jena.rdf.listeners.StatementListener
    Listen to Jena statement events to see whether a certain property was added or removed.
    Author:
    acoburn
